_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[(user===null||user===void 0?void 0:user.role)==='employer'?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/employer",className:"nav-link",children:"Employer Dashboard"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/dashboard",className:"nav-link",children:"Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"nav-user",children:["Welcome, ",user===null||user===void 0?void 0:user.email]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogout,className:"nav-link nav-button",children:"Logout"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/// Guest user menu
_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",className:"nav-link",children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/register",className:"nav-link nav-cta",children:"Register"})]})]})]})});};export default Navbar;
